excerpts: They have cookies, which you can make a cookie ice cream sandwich with, but unfortunately don't have a gluten free cookie option.
Also, I've been meaning to try out their shakes since they look so good!
ice cream sandwich.author: Gita r.
ice cream sandwich.review:
We usually always come here or smitten after dinner on chestnut street. 

The staff here are friendly and are patient with you trying flavors even when there's a line. And the price is very reasonable! It's also a small narrow shop so don't expect to find seating. 

They have some great flavors including salted butterscotch and mint chocolate chip which I usually go for.

They have cookies, which you can make a cookie ice cream sandwich with, but unfortunately don't have a gluten free cookie option. Also, I've been meaning to try out their shakes since they look so good!

excerpts: I probably wouldn't recommend getting the ice cream sandwich though...
the cookies were kind of hard and not that amazing.
But ice cream was really good!
Definitely come here if you are looking to get ice cream.
ice cream sandwich.author: Jackie C.
ice cream sandwich.review:
This ice cream place was good. I would recommend getting the drumstick flavor. They have about 15-20 flavors available. I probably wouldn't recommend getting the ice cream sandwich though... the cookies were kind of hard and not that amazing. But ice cream was really good! Definitely come here if you are looking to get ice cream. It costs about $5.

There are a couple tables and chairs in the back if you want to enjoy your treat at the place. Parking is on the street and the place is located across the street from the Apple store and Walgreens. I would recommend this place to other people.

excerpts: The ice cream sandwich can't be beat!
ice cream sandwich.author: Kaley K.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Can't get much better than cookies and ice cream. The cookies at this place were incredibly tasty! They were simply and perfect. Lightly crunchy on the edges and gooey in the middle. The ice cream sandwich can't be beat! 

4 stars for cleanliness and no bathroom :(

excerpts: but this time I opted for an ice cream sandwich ($6).
I ended up choosing the oreo swirl and wow it was so creamy!
ice cream sandwich.author: Mikayla M.
ice cream sandwich.review: If you are in the Marina and are craving ice cream, I recommend trying this place.   I love how there are so many options!  Although they can get busy, it is worth it.  I did come here before and got the cookie monster which was amazing but this time I opted for an ice cream sandwich ($6). I ended up choosing the oreo swirl and wow it was so creamy!  I also got the cookies n cream and peanut butter chocolate chip cookies for my sandwich.  I loved the peanut butter chocolate chip that was so good! This place will not disappoint.

excerpts: It is $5 for two scoops and they have a specialty where they have fresh baked cookies as a cup for your ice cream or a cookie ice cream sandwich -
I was too full
so I didn't get the cookies, but I will return for it one day.
Service was friend and quick.
They also sell freshly packed pints for you to bring home too.
There's also a seating area in the back :)
ice cream sandwich.author: Amanda C.
ice cream sandwich.review: Came here around 8pm on a Thursday after dinner for desserts! Parking sucks around here but lots to look at when you do find parking. There was a short line when we arrived and got to try flavors before buying. I wish they had the earl grey when I went, but I really enjoyed the mint cholocate chip and the caramel cookie dough on top of my sugar cone. It is $5 for two scoops and they have a specialty where they have fresh baked cookies as a cup for your ice cream or a cookie ice cream sandwich - I was too full so I didn't get the cookies, but I will return for it one day. Service was friend and quick. They also sell freshly packed pints for you to bring home too. There's also a seating area in the back :)

excerpts: so you couldn't eat it like an ice cream sandwich.
ice cream sandwich.author: Geena G.
ice cream sandwich.review: Staff was friendly, cookies were tasty, ice cream was bland and didn't have much to it.  We got the cookie monster ice cream and it was just vanilla ice cream died blue with a few cookie pieces here and there and it was super soft so you couldn't eat it like an ice cream sandwich.

excerpts: so I should opt for an ice cream sandwich next time.
ice cream sandwich.author: Veronica L.
ice cream sandwich.review: Definitely rich and creamy. I love ice cream so I was happy to taste the funfetti, caramel cookie dough, and chocolate. Nothing wowed me but it's def ice cream so I'll eat it. Funfetti was pretty and fun looking and kinda tasted like cake. I ate it with the caramel cookie dough and both tasted the same  to me - just really sweet and creamy.  Perhaps the cookies compliment the ice cream better so I should opt for an ice cream sandwich next time.

excerpts: Definitely worth a try if you're craving a cookie ice cream sandwich.
It was a great little shop and I enjoyed my ice cream sandwich, but the flavors are kind of generic
ice cream sandwich.author: Hana B.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Definitely worth a try if you're craving a cookie ice cream sandwich.

This place is located on a really hip looking street. At least it is at night! The whole street is full of activity, but family friendly activity. The ice cream shop itself if VERY well lit so it's absolutely perfect for pictures! 

The man who helped us was super nice too. He patiently waited while we were tying to decide. They had a flavor called Straciatella, which I've never heard of. It was good! He let me try it before I got it too, which was nice. 

The cookie itself was pretty warm and perfect amount of softness. 

The only thing is that this place wasn't tooooo memorable for me. It was a great little shop and I enjoyed my ice cream sandwich, but the flavors are kind of generic and I could easily make these cookie sandwiches at home or find a place anywhere I go that would have similar flavors and same concept.

Overall I enjoyed the place and would consider coming again if there wasn't another place I wanted to try.

excerpts: While my friend ordered their coffee caramel crunch with a chocolate chip cookie on the side, I went with their pistachio and a double fudge on the side (neither of us were willing to do a full ice cream sandwich for our first meal of the day).
ice cream sandwich.author: Johnny W.
ice cream sandwich.review:
So, I will shamefully admit that this marks the fifth time I had ice cream this week. But man, was it worth it! Move on over CREAM, you've got some sugary competition! Kind of. CREAM, in its various incarnations across the Bay Area, is still far more easily accessible than Over the Moon out in Marina, and sometimes convenience does win out over quality (instant ramen, anyone?).

While my friend ordered their coffee caramel crunch with a chocolate chip cookie on the side, I went with their pistachio and a double fudge on the side (neither of us were willing to do a full ice cream sandwich for our first meal of the day). I was initially a little skeptical about the savory and sweet combination, but it worked out fantastically well: the slightly salty pistachio ice cream offset the super sweet double fudge (and chocolate chip half I snagged from my friend) nicely.

Their ice cream alone can't stand up to the likes of Humphry and Mr & Mrs, but was definitely tastier than that of CREAM. Their cookies, on the other hand, were quite tasty on their own, though a little inconsistent in texture: the chocolate chip was nice and soft, while the double fudge was harder. Whether this was due to higher demand and thus, faster turnover for the former, or just a matter of how the cookies are made, I'm uncertain.

***Accessibility Info***

Venue - The venue's pretty small, with slightly higher counter seating up front, and a few regular two tops in the back, that are perfectly accessible.

Bathroom - Didn't check them out.

excerpts: I had the ice cream sandwich with oatmeal raisin cookies and ginger ice cream.
It was amazing!
My husband had the funfetti ice cream, and approved of it (it really tastes like frosting from childhood birthday cakes)!
ice cream sandwich.author: Catherine J.
ice cream sandwich.review: Yummy flavors and cookies! I had the ice cream sandwich with oatmeal raisin cookies and ginger ice cream. It was amazing! My husband had the funfetti ice cream, and approved of it (it really tastes like frosting from childhood birthday cakes)!

excerpts: Ice Cream Sandwich ($5): coffee caramel crunch ice cream (sounds amazing already, right?), chocolate chip cookie, and oatmeal chocolate chip cookie.
I ate the whole thing deconstructed aka
ice cream sandwich.author: Ellen W.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Love the COOKIES, but the not-so-much the ice cream. In fact, this joint can quiet possibly be one of the top cookie spots in the city! Yes, I would chose this over Cream any day -- because the cookies are THAT good. Their ice cream is very flavorful but a bit too rich and creamy for my liking -- kinda gave me a stomachache. 

Their homemade cookies though... O MG I would come back solely for the Oatmeal Chocolate Chip cookies -- PERFECT googey center, buttery, and full of cinnamon and chocolate sugar goodness. WOW!!

I got Ice Cream Sandwich ($5): coffee caramel crunch ice cream (sounds amazing already, right?), chocolate chip cookie, and oatmeal chocolate chip cookie. I ate the whole thing deconstructed aka I asked for the cookies "on the side", so that I can enjoy each treat individually. 

They are known for their Coffee Caramel Crunch and Honey Lavender flavor. The homemade cookies were the perfect size and shape, medium with height so you know it's gooey and buttery inside -- so amazing!

The man behind the counter could be a bit sweeter, I mean it is an ice shop after all and people want a happy, joyful overall experience. Nevertheless, his service was speedy and efficient, but I did feel pretty rushed to make my choice and move on. It's a bit stuffy inside too, but they have a great countertop seating at the storefront, so it's perfect for people watching. Overall, cookies are worth it and Da Bomb!  I'm a fan fashizzles :D

excerpts: I prefer the ratio of ice cream to cookie with the cookie bowl than an ice cream sandwich.
What a fantastic idea!
Our whole family (from 2-60) loves their ice cream and cookies (bowls or sandwiches).
When we finished our ice cream
my two year old (almost 3) said "that was yummy ice cream!
We will definitely be back for more next time we are in the city.
ice cream sandwich.author: Jill B.
ice cream sandwich.review: We just visited Over the Moon again and they have cookie bowls!  How delicious!  I prefer the ratio of ice cream to cookie with the cookie bowl than an ice cream sandwich.  What a fantastic idea!  Our whole family (from 2-60) loves their ice cream and cookies (bowls or sandwiches).  When we finished our ice cream my two year old (almost 3) said "that was yummy ice cream!" We will definitely be back for more next time we are in the city.

excerpts: You can choose 2 different cookies to make the base of the ice cream sandwich!
I would stay away from the oreo cookie because it was so hard, but the chocolate chip was amazing!
They have a bunch of flavors including green tea and earl grey!
You'll definitely find a cookie and ice cream you love!
The person making the sandwich is really nice too even though he is the only person working the cashier AND making the sandwiches with a LONG ASS LINE.
Props to the hard worker and leave a nice tip!
ice cream sandwich.author: Andrew S.
ice cream sandwich.review: You can choose 2 different cookies to make the base of the ice cream sandwich! I would stay away from the oreo cookie because it was so hard, but the chocolate chip was amazing! They have a bunch of flavors including green tea and earl grey! You'll definitely find a cookie and ice cream you love! The person making the sandwich is really nice too even though he is the only person working the cashier AND making the sandwiches with a LONG ASS LINE. Props to the hard worker and leave a nice tip! =)

excerpts: Bf got mint chocolate chip oreo ice cream sandwich.
ice cream sandwich.author: Shereen A.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Aiiiight.

Found the ice cream to be on the icier side. I tried 3-4 flavors and didn't really like it enough to commit. Bf got mint chocolate chip oreo ice cream sandwich. He said his was good.

Cookies aren't homemade.

excerpts: For $4 you can get an ice cream sandwich with your choice of cookie.
The cookies are soft and pliable, not crunchy.
Really glad I opted for this choice.
ice cream sandwich.author: David C.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Classic style ice cream with strong flavors.  Competitive pricing and excellent location.

I'd highly recommend the:
-  Oreo Cream
-  Honey Lavender 
-  Snickerdoodle

Protip:  For $4 you can get an ice cream sandwich with your choice of cookie.  The cookies are soft and pliable, not crunchy.  Really glad I opted for this choice.

excerpts: Where else in SF can you get a made-to-order ice cream sandwich with freshly baked cookies?!
And in the posh Marina district, no less.
They have quite the cookie selection: chocolate chip, chocolate chip w/ Oatmeal, Orea, cookies & cream, snickerdoodle, peanut butter and oatmeal w/ raisins.
They have around 20 ice cream flavors.
I tried the earl grey, the lavender honey and the coffee with toffee crunch.
The girl that served us was super nice and very sweet, even though we asked to try so many flavors.
This place is dangerous to my waistline, but oh so worth it!
ice cream sandwich.author: Alice W.
ice cream sandwich.review: Love, love, LOVE this place!! Where else in SF can you get a made-to-order ice cream sandwich with freshly baked cookies?! And in the posh Marina district, no less. They have quite the cookie selection: chocolate chip, chocolate chip w/ Oatmeal, Orea, cookies & cream, snickerdoodle, peanut butter and oatmeal w/ raisins. They have around 20 ice cream flavors. I tried the earl grey, the lavender honey and the coffee with toffee crunch. The girl that served us was super nice and very sweet, even though we asked to try so many flavors. This place is dangerous to my waistline, but oh so worth it!

excerpts: You can make an ice cream sandwich with the cookies, or simply just add one on top of your cone.
ice cream sandwich.author: Jessica S.
ice cream sandwich.review: Over the Moon has such a smooth texture to the ice cream. They have a large variety of flavors to choose from and they have cookies! You can make an ice cream sandwich with the cookies, or simply just add one on top of your cone.

excerpts: I'd come back for regular ice cream if I'm already in the area, but otherwise, the Bay Area has better ice cream and ice cream sandwich options.
ice cream sandwich.author: Kelly R.
ice cream sandwich.review:
I'm a sucker for ice cream sandwiches, so I was pretty excited to stumble into Over the Moon on a sunny afternoon in the Marina.

I wasn't very hungry, so I asked if I could do a half sandwich (a la CREAM), which they said they couldn't accommodate, so I instead went for one cookie and a scoop of ice cream, which was alright but slightly disappointing because 1) for some reason the staff refused to sandwich the ice cream between the two cookie halves, and 2) my cookie wasn't warm. If you're not hungry, I'd definitely recommend trying to split the sandwich with someone else as the cookie + scoop of ice cream was literally only cents cheaper than what the whole sandwich would have been. To Over the Moon's credit, though, the ice cream was tasty and old-fashioned -- I had the coffee crunch, which went well with the chocolate chip cookie.

I'd come back for regular ice cream if I'm already in the area, but otherwise, the Bay Area has better ice cream and ice cream sandwich options.

excerpts: They can even make a custom ice cream sandwich for you since they have cookies too!
ice cream sandwich.author: Ed L.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Replaced the Yogorino shop (even same Ice Cream freezer) but with much more reasonable prices. They can even make a custom ice cream sandwich for you since they have cookies too!

Check 'em out!

excerpts: Make your own ice cream sandwich??
I'm there!
Had a great selection of ice cream flavors to choose from.
Decided to order a couple ice cream sandwiches to split with friends and was happy with the selection of cookies.
ice cream sandwich.author: Kim-Anh P.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Make your own ice cream sandwich?? I'm there! Had a great selection of ice cream flavors to choose from. Decided to order a couple ice cream sandwiches to split with friends and was happy with the selection of cookies. Although you'll notice that some cookies are bigger than others so made me feel I should get the biggest cookie to get my money's worth.

Delicious and fun sweet treats :)

excerpts: I tried an ice cream sandwich.
It was so rich and decedent!!!
ice cream sandwich.author: Hayden C.
ice cream sandwich.review: The guy working here is super friendly. He is the definition of excellent customer service. I tried an ice cream sandwich. It was so rich and decedent!!!

excerpts: I had my first cookie-ice cream sandwich there
The ice cream was delicious and the cookies super fresh.
I will go there again soon!
ice cream sandwich.author: Romain D.
ice cream sandwich.review:
This place is in the heart of the marina. I had my first cookie-ice cream sandwich there
The ice cream was delicious and the cookies super fresh. I will go there again soon!

excerpts: Stopped by for an ice cream sandwich and it may have been the best decision of my life.
I'm not kidding.
I can't wait to come back in October.
ice cream sandwich.author: David B.
ice cream sandwich.review: Heaven.  Stopped by for an ice cream sandwich and it may have been the best decision of my life. I'm not kidding. I can't wait to come back in October.

excerpts:
- Parking in the Marina is expensive, but you can just skip out on the drive

If we're ever in the Marina, it'll be hard to say no to another snickerdoodle/coffee ice cream sandwich!
ice cream sandwich.author: Grace Y.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Had an excellent experience at Over the Moon!

Pluses:
- Everything is homemade in the shop, the ice cream AND the cookies
- Variety in cookies and ice cream
- Free samples of ice cream so you can be sure you like what you got (just ask)
- Great customer service, the guy who helped us out was really friendly and patient with us
- They have a non-dairy, non-fat frozen yogurt option
- They have togo options of ice cream and icecream sammies that you can take home to enjoy

Minuses:
- Parking in the Marina is expensive, but you can just skip out on the drive

If we're ever in the Marina, it'll be hard to say no to another snickerdoodle/coffee ice cream sandwich!

excerpts: Seeing that they had a vanilla bean ice cream, warm chocolate chip cookies, and a custom ice cream sandwich menu item to combine the two sold me.
ice cream sandwich.author: Kevin H.
ice cream sandwich.review:
While chatting with my wife in this tiny takeout ice cream parlor about what to get, she happened to point out the fresh-made cookies--which my nose had already scouted beforehand--when another customer said, "their cookies are delicious." Followed up by, "the ice cream is great too."

You know a place is good when people are happy to brag about it unsolicited.

Seeing that they had a vanilla bean ice cream, warm chocolate chip cookies, and a custom ice cream sandwich menu item to combine the two sold me. Thankfully, it was served in a wide cup with a spoon, because the ice cream portion was too generous for me to get through it just as a sandwich in my hands.

The cookies were indeed delicious and the ice cream dense and rich. I had no room for this dessert after the lunch I just consumed down the street, but that didn't stop me from devouring my treat. I will be back--after a bit of guilt-induced exercising.

excerpts: Stopped by and tried the custom ice cream sandwich.
ice cream sandwich.author: Travis B.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Stopped by and tried the custom ice cream sandwich. 2 chocolate chip cookies + chocolate peanut butter ice cream = party in my mouth and everyone is invited! 

Insider tip: eat it quick before it makes a mess!!!

excerpts: but you can also get your ice cream sandwich on by adding some cookies.
ice cream sandwich.author: Patrick K.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Ohhh hooo yeah.  The only thing I love more than pizza is ice cream.... and this place does ice cream very well.

The Ice cream is great on it's own but you can also get your ice cream sandwich on by adding some cookies.  The wife and I went on date night and I went with the snicker doodle ice cream with the chocolate chip cookies. It almost blew my taste buds right out of my mouth!!!

Brian the owner is also one heck of a guy.

excerpts: It is nice that you can create a custom ice cream sandwich with your choice of ice cream flavor and cookies.

But the small
cup only let u get 1 scoop.
The flavors were not impressive but given the lack of ice cream options in the neighborhood, it is still a popular spot.
ice cream sandwich.author: Nancy Z.
ice cream sandwich.review:
Honey lavender was a bit too strong on lavender, wasn't great. Crunchy road was little too sweet. 
It is nice that you can create a custom ice cream sandwich with your choice of ice cream flavor and cookies. But the small
cup only let u get 1 scoop. 
The flavors were not impressive but given the lack of ice cream options in the neighborhood, it is still a popular spot.

excerpts: Like you needed a cup of water with you after eating that ice cream sandwich.
my cookie was not soft or moist and was hard and crunchy.
overall I still like cream the best in Berkeley and walnut creek!!
Nothing beats their ice cream sammies.
ice cream sandwich.author: Jacqueline J.
ice cream sandwich.review: Ordered the peanut butter cookie sandwich with the pb&j ice cream. It was good but really  sweet!! Like you needed a cup of water with you after eating that ice cream sandwich. my cookie was not soft or moist and was hard and crunchy. overall I still like cream the best in Berkeley and walnut creek!! Nothing beats their ice cream sammies.

excerpts: We happened to walk by and strolled in, because an ice cream sandwich sounded dang good!
ice cream sandwich.author: Elaine Y.
ice cream sandwich.review:
We happened to walk by and strolled in, because an ice cream sandwich sounded dang good! We tried the following flavors:

Honey lavender - sweet, creamy, and more honey than lavender. Good.
Salted butterscotch - sweet, salty, creamy. Good.
Frozen banana - tasted like they stuck a chocolate-covered frozen banana into an ice cream machine. Quite good!
Coffee toffee crunch - my favorite of the flavors I sampled. Delicious and creamy!

We ended up not getting sandwiches, but I'd definitely come back for the coffee toffee crunch again!

excerpts: so I had the peanutbutter with chocolate chunks cookie ice cream sandwich with chocolate peanutbutter ice cream   $5.00.
ice cream sandwich.author: Kristin K.
ice cream sandwich.review: OMG. I love peanut butter and chocolate so I had the peanutbutter with chocolate chunks cookie ice cream sandwich with chocolate peanutbutter ice cream   $5.00. Hubby had snickerdoodles with choc mint ice cream. So for $10 we had a great honemade dessert very nicely done. Wish I took a pucture but it was too good it went fast !

excerpts: I loved my ice cream sandwich, I've been wanting to try this place for awhile and finally got a chance.
ice cream sandwich.author: Sarah A.
ice cream sandwich.review: OMG- this was AMAZING. I loved my ice cream sandwich, I've been wanting to try this place for awhile and finally got a chance. I got the cookies and cream cookies and the oreo cream ice cream (NOT the cookies and cream ice cream) it was described to me as being similiar to the middle of an oreo and was SOOOO GOOD. The ice cream was super smooth and creamy and the cookies were fresh baked, dense and so yummy. Cannot say enough about this place, a must go for a sweet treat and try this combo if you love Oreo's/ cookies and cream :)

excerpts: Came here for dessert and ended up getting a ice cream sandwich.
Good thing about this place is they give you the ice cream sandwich in a cup that way if it breaks while you're eating it you can still scoop it up with a spoon.
ice cream sandwich.author: Joycelyn L.
ice cream sandwich.review: Came here for dessert and ended up getting a ice cream sandwich.  I got the coffee caramel crunch ice cream and oatmeal raisin cookies.  The ice cream was definitely better than the cookies.  The cookies are probably made that morning or the night before, they aren't soft and right out of the oven like I'm used to with CREAM.  Good thing about this place is they give you the ice cream sandwich in a cup that way if it breaks while you're eating it you can still scoop it up with a spoon.

excerpts: I had an ice cream sandwich when you can pick two different cookies and have whatever flavor of ice cream that you like.
The staff is super friendly and I would highly recommend this place
ice cream sandwich.author: Jason Y.
ice cream sandwich.review: Place is amazing. Walked in randomly and left a huge fan. I had an ice cream sandwich when you can pick two different cookies and have whatever flavor of ice cream that you like.  The staff is super friendly and I would highly recommend this place

excerpts: Ginger ice cream w/ snicker doodle ice cream sandwich was a little piece of heaven.
The staff couldn't have been nicer...
we tasted a ton of samples.
Last night in SF was made memorable by this amazing shop.
My family also highly recommends the honey lavender, pb & j, and raspberry ice creams.
ice cream sandwich.author: Melissa K.
ice cream sandwich.review: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!! Ginger ice cream w/ snicker doodle ice cream sandwich was a little piece of heaven. The staff couldn't have been nicer...we tasted a ton of samples. Last night in SF was made memorable by this amazing shop. My family also highly recommends the honey lavender, pb & j, and raspberry ice creams.

excerpts: Got the ice cream sandwich with fresh warm cookies.
Delicious!
I would come back, if I actually lived in SF.
ice cream sandwich.author: Nina A.
ice cream sandwich.review: Spontaneous decision to come in and I'm glad we came in.  Quick line.  The girl working was really nice and guided us on what to get, since we've never been there before.  Got the ice cream sandwich with fresh warm cookies.  Delicious!  I would come back, if I actually lived in SF.

excerpts: The best coffee ice cream sandwich ever!
I wish there is one closer to home!
If you are in the marina please do yourself a favor and stop by this little ice cream shop!
ice cream sandwich.author: Jennifer D.
ice cream sandwich.review: OMG can I just say YUM!!!!! The best coffee ice cream sandwich ever! I wish there is one closer to home! If you are in the marina please do yourself a favor and stop by this little ice cream shop!

excerpts: .... forget your normal ice cream sandwich.
This is THE BOMB.
you will never buy a store bought ice cream sandwich again.
ice cream sandwich.author: Julie K.
ice cream sandwich.review: OMG...sooooo good.... forget your normal ice cream sandwich. This is THE BOMB. you will never buy a store bought ice cream sandwich again.

excerpts: ahhhhhh..... $4 for a custom ice cream sandwich????!!!!!
ice cream sandwich.author: Zak C.
ice cream sandwich.review:
ahhhhhh..... $4 for a custom ice cream sandwich????!!!!! yyyyyayaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaasssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss 

my love life - completed. i now live for their amazing hand crafted ice cream.

excerpts: The custom ice cream sandwich is a must.
Peanut Butter cookies with Honey Lavender ice cream!!!
ice cream sandwich.author: Michael S.
ice cream sandwich.review: Yum Yum and Double Yum. The custom ice cream sandwich is a must. Peanut Butter cookies with Honey Lavender ice cream!!!

excerpts: I was initially a little skeptical about the savory and sweet combination, but it worked out fantastically well: the slightly salty pistachio ice cream offset the super sweet double fudge (and chocolate chip
pistachio ice cream.author: Johnny W.
pistachio ice cream.review:
So, I will shamefully admit that this marks the fifth time I had ice cream this week. But man, was it worth it! Move on over CREAM, you've got some sugary competition! Kind of. CREAM, in its various incarnations across the Bay Area, is still far more easily accessible than Over the Moon out in Marina, and sometimes convenience does win out over quality (instant ramen, anyone?).

While my friend ordered their coffee caramel crunch with a chocolate chip cookie on the side, I went with their pistachio and a double fudge on the side (neither of us were willing to do a full ice cream sandwich for our first meal of the day). I was initially a little skeptical about the savory and sweet combination, but it worked out fantastically well: the slightly salty pistachio ice cream offset the super sweet double fudge (and chocolate chip half I snagged from my friend) nicely.

Their ice cream alone can't stand up to the likes of Humphry and Mr & Mrs, but was definitely tastier than that of CREAM. Their cookies, on the other hand, were quite tasty on their own, though a little inconsistent in texture: the chocolate chip was nice and soft, while the double fudge was harder. Whether this was due to higher demand and thus, faster turnover for the former, or just a matter of how the cookies are made, I'm uncertain.

***Accessibility Info***

Venue - The venue's pretty small, with slightly higher counter seating up front, and a few regular two tops in the back, that are perfectly accessible.

Bathroom - Didn't check them out.

excerpts: I also got the cookies n cream and peanut butter chocolate chip cookies for my sandwich.
I loved the peanut butter chocolate chip that was so good!
This place will not disappoint.
chocolate chip cookies.author: Mikayla M.
chocolate chip cookies.review: If you are in the Marina and are craving ice cream, I recommend trying this place.   I love how there are so many options!  Although they can get busy, it is worth it.  I did come here before and got the cookie monster which was amazing but this time I opted for an ice cream sandwich ($6). I ended up choosing the oreo swirl and wow it was so creamy!  I also got the cookies n cream and peanut butter chocolate chip cookies for my sandwich.  I loved the peanut butter chocolate chip that was so good! This place will not disappoint.

excerpts: The Moon creamy for their chocolate chip cookies.
I've tried Sift, Cream, Baked Bear and a few other shops
but NO ONE has CC Cookies as good as OTMC
chocolate chip cookies.author: Angel R.
chocolate chip cookies.review:
Cookies - I absolutely love coming to Over The Moon creamy for their chocolate chip cookies. I've tried Sift, Cream, Baked Bear and a few other shops but NO ONE has CC Cookies as good as OTMC: they're big, full of mini chocolate chips and not too sweet - just perfect. 

Ice cream - it's SO sweet. I just can't. The flavors are creative. The chocolate is weak. 

I love the location and friendliness of the staff. I'll continue to come here for the amazing cookies!

excerpts: They also have the cookie monster flavor which is blue colored vanilla ice cream with bits of chocolate chip cookies, how adorable!
chocolate chip cookies.author: Stephanie L.
chocolate chip cookies.review:
Since I'm an ice cream lover, I'm surprised I never heard of this place. I was in the area and paypal was offering a deal for Over the Moon, so I just couldn't resist.

Parking in the marina could be a bit difficult depending on the time of day and what day of the week, but in general, the marina is a pretty busy place. It's all street parking or residential parking. You really have to test your luck and patience here.

They have a great ice cream selection here. I ended up getting the coffee caramel crunch with chocolate chip and snickerdoodle cookies. Their ice cream sandwiches are only $4! Personally, the cookies were way too sweet for me. But they were soft baked cookies which I like. But I LOVED their ice cream. They also had Andes mint ice cream which was chocolate ice cream with bits of andes chocolates. This was also one of my faves, the chocolate was rich and not too sweet, reminded me of a fudgsicle and the subtle hint of mint was delicious. They also have the cookie monster flavor which is blue colored vanilla ice cream with bits of chocolate chip cookies, how adorable! They also have other unique flavors like honey lavender and earl grey.

Service was meh. The girl that helped us was definitely not happy to be working on a Saturday night. I came with the bf after dinner and he ordered himself a bag of cookies. I was ordering separately to use my Paypal offer. After helping him, she went ahead and just stood behind the register on her phone! I felt bad for interrupting her but I asked to try some flavors. After sampling, she asked me if I was going to order something with some attitude in her tone of voice. Of course I was going to order something! Why else would I still be standing there after sampling ice cream flavors?! Afterwards, she went to the back and left the front unattended. Pretty unprofessional if you ask me. A group of people walked in right after she left too and they weren't helped until another work came back out.

The only good thing here was their ice cream. Honestly, a 2 star place, but giving it 3 because of their ice cream.

excerpts: O MG I would come back solely for the Oatmeal Chocolate Chip cookies -- PERFECT googey center, buttery, and full of cinnamon and chocolate sugar goodness.
chocolate chip cookies.author: Ellen W.
chocolate chip cookies.review:
Love the COOKIES, but the not-so-much the ice cream. In fact, this joint can quiet possibly be one of the top cookie spots in the city! Yes, I would chose this over Cream any day -- because the cookies are THAT good. Their ice cream is very flavorful but a bit too rich and creamy for my liking -- kinda gave me a stomachache. 

Their homemade cookies though... O MG I would come back solely for the Oatmeal Chocolate Chip cookies -- PERFECT googey center, buttery, and full of cinnamon and chocolate sugar goodness. WOW!!

I got Ice Cream Sandwich ($5): coffee caramel crunch ice cream (sounds amazing already, right?), chocolate chip cookie, and oatmeal chocolate chip cookie. I ate the whole thing deconstructed aka I asked for the cookies "on the side", so that I can enjoy each treat individually. 

They are known for their Coffee Caramel Crunch and Honey Lavender flavor. The homemade cookies were the perfect size and shape, medium with height so you know it's gooey and buttery inside -- so amazing!

The man behind the counter could be a bit sweeter, I mean it is an ice shop after all and people want a happy, joyful overall experience. Nevertheless, his service was speedy and efficient, but I did feel pretty rushed to make my choice and move on. It's a bit stuffy inside too, but they have a great countertop seating at the storefront, so it's perfect for people watching. Overall, cookies are worth it and Da Bomb!  I'm a fan fashizzles :D

excerpts: " A sweet little sweet shop with out of the ordinary ice cream flavors and freshly baked chocolate chip cookies, what more could you ask for?
chocolate chip cookies.author: Jen H.
chocolate chip cookies.review: Got the freshly made banana ice cream and can I just say "YUM!" A sweet little sweet shop with out of the ordinary ice cream flavors and freshly baked chocolate chip cookies, what more could you ask for?

excerpts: The chocolate chip cookies are fresh out the oven.
it's a perfect combination with the ice cream.
And before you pick out the flavor the server is not greedy about letting you try the different flavors.
chocolate chip cookies.author: Wendy G.
chocolate chip cookies.review: visiting from LA & on our last night we wanted have some ice cream while we enjoyed the beautiful city of SF. Well this this spot is the perfect gem! I had cookies & cream with a chocolate chip cookie & my fiancée had coffee caramel. The chocolate chip cookies are fresh out the oven. it's a perfect combination with the ice cream. And before you pick out the flavor the server is not greedy about letting you try the different flavors.

excerpts: Their salted butterscotch ice cream is smooth and perfectly balanced between being not too sweet and also slightly salted, this flavor between two of their chocolate chip cookies is the perfect dessert.
The cookies are a bit crisp on the outside and chewy on the inside -- yum!
I also give 5 stars to the very friendly and super helpful young lady behind the counter who described their various flavors and combinations!
I'm sorry
I didn't ask her name, she was wonderful!
chocolate chip cookies.author: Melanie J.
chocolate chip cookies.review: It's a darn good thing that I rarely get to visit The Marina because Over the Moon would be my favorite treat! Their salted butterscotch ice cream is smooth and perfectly balanced between being not too sweet and also slightly salted, this flavor between two of their chocolate chip cookies is the perfect dessert. The cookies are a bit crisp on the outside and chewy on the inside -- yum! I also give 5 stars to the very friendly and super helpful young lady behind the counter who described their various flavors and combinations! I'm sorry I didn't ask her name, she was wonderful!

excerpts: Seeing that they had a vanilla bean ice cream, warm chocolate chip cookies, and a custom ice cream sandwich menu item to combine the two sold me.
chocolate chip cookies.author: Kevin H.
chocolate chip cookies.review:
While chatting with my wife in this tiny takeout ice cream parlor about what to get, she happened to point out the fresh-made cookies--which my nose had already scouted beforehand--when another customer said, "their cookies are delicious." Followed up by, "the ice cream is great too."

You know a place is good when people are happy to brag about it unsolicited.

Seeing that they had a vanilla bean ice cream, warm chocolate chip cookies, and a custom ice cream sandwich menu item to combine the two sold me. Thankfully, it was served in a wide cup with a spoon, because the ice cream portion was too generous for me to get through it just as a sandwich in my hands.

The cookies were indeed delicious and the ice cream dense and rich. I had no room for this dessert after the lunch I just consumed down the street, but that didn't stop me from devouring my treat. I will be back--after a bit of guilt-induced exercising.

excerpts: Their chocolate chip cookies for their ice cream sandwiches are AMAZING!!!
Too bad they don't have more dairy free options
chocolate chip cookies.author: Sharon T.
chocolate chip cookies.review:
Their chocolate chip cookies for their ice cream sandwiches are AMAZING!!! 
Too bad they don't have more dairy free options

excerpts: 2 chocolate chip cookies + chocolate peanut butter ice cream
chocolate chip cookies.author: Travis B.
chocolate chip cookies.review:
Stopped by and tried the custom ice cream sandwich. 2 chocolate chip cookies + chocolate peanut butter ice cream = party in my mouth and everyone is invited! 

Insider tip: eat it quick before it makes a mess!!!

excerpts: The wife and I went on date night and I went with the snicker doodle ice cream with the chocolate chip cookies.
chocolate chip cookies.author: Patrick K.
chocolate chip cookies.review:
Ohhh hooo yeah.  The only thing I love more than pizza is ice cream.... and this place does ice cream very well.

The Ice cream is great on it's own but you can also get your ice cream sandwich on by adding some cookies.  The wife and I went on date night and I went with the snicker doodle ice cream with the chocolate chip cookies. It almost blew my taste buds right out of my mouth!!!

Brian the owner is also one heck of a guy.

excerpts: My daughter got the cookie monster with chocolate chip cookies.
Omg..the first 5 bites of the honey lavender was super delicious...but after a while, I got so sick of it!
It's really creamy and heavy.
I couldn't finish it anymore, kinda ruined my appetite for sweets that whole day!
My daughter's combo was not that great because the cookie monster already has bites of cookies, plus the chocolate chip cookie made it too much cookies!
But the cookie was yummy.
I think I will stick with the frozen yogurts next time.....
chocolate chip cookies.author: Alyce l.
chocolate chip cookies.review: tasted: nutter butter banana, earl grey & honey lavender. Honey lavender stood out to me so I ordered one scoop in a cup. My daughter got the cookie monster with chocolate chip cookies. Omg..the first 5 bites of the honey lavender was super delicious...but after a while, I got so sick of it! It's really creamy and heavy. I couldn't finish it anymore, kinda ruined my appetite for sweets that whole day!  My daughter's combo was not that great because the cookie monster already has bites of cookies, plus the chocolate chip cookie made it too much cookies!  But the cookie was yummy.  I think I will stick with the frozen yogurts next time.....

excerpts: The chocolate chip cookies are also to die for - they warm them up for you and they taste like heaven.
There's even a little bit of salt on top.
I'm obsessed.
chocolate chip cookies.author: Amanda B.
chocolate chip cookies.review: This is the best ice cream I've ever had. The texture is ridiculously creamy and even when you bring a pint home the texture holds up for a whole week. My favorite by far is the Raspberry ice cream (not to be confused with the Raspberry sorbet). I can also vouch for the Blueberry and Cookies & Cream. The chocolate chip cookies are also to die for - they warm them up for you and they taste like heaven. There's even a little bit of salt on top. I'm obsessed.

excerpts: Warm, melty chocolate chip cookies with a big scoop of mint chip ice cream......amazing!
People were really great too.
Nice addition to the hood.
chocolate chip cookies.author: Eamonn T.
chocolate chip cookies.review: Warm, melty chocolate chip cookies with a big scoop of mint chip ice cream......amazing!  People were really great too.  Nice addition to the hood.

excerpts: Coffee ice cream cuddled lovingly between two WARM chocolate chip cookies.
Such a simple dessert restaurant idea, but they got it
right!
I will definitely be back!
chocolate chip cookies.author: Jennie T.
chocolate chip cookies.review: An explosion of joy in my mouth. Coffee ice cream cuddled lovingly between two WARM chocolate chip cookies. Such a simple dessert restaurant idea, but they got it right! I will definitely be back!

excerpts: I also got the cookies n cream and peanut butter chocolate chip cookies for my sandwich.
I loved the peanut butter chocolate chip that was so good!
This place will not disappoint.
peanut butter chocolate chip cookies.author: Mikayla M.
peanut butter chocolate chip cookies.review: If you are in the Marina and are craving ice cream, I recommend trying this place.   I love how there are so many options!  Although they can get busy, it is worth it.  I did come here before and got the cookie monster which was amazing but this time I opted for an ice cream sandwich ($6). I ended up choosing the oreo swirl and wow it was so creamy!  I also got the cookies n cream and peanut butter chocolate chip cookies for my sandwich.  I loved the peanut butter chocolate chip that was so good! This place will not disappoint.

excerpts: We tried the snickerdoodle and the cookies and cream cookies.
They unfortunately ran out of the Oreo flavored ones ):
cookies and cream cookies.author: Doris K.
cookies and cream cookies.review:
I had the Cookie Monster ice cream, and it was average. Note: I'm not a huge ice cream fan to begin with, but the blue ice cream and high reviews intrigued me.

But the cookies are to die for! We sat down outside to finish the ice cream and decided to try a cookie, and O M G. They were still warm and oh-so-soft. This might sound weird, but the cookies were fluffy! The texture was really unique -- the inside was almost bread-y and the outside was nice and crunchy. And did I mention it was still warm??

We tried the snickerdoodle and the cookies and cream cookies. They unfortunately ran out of the Oreo flavored ones ): I really liked the snickernoodles while the bf liked the cookies and cream ones. 

I'd definitely come back for the cookies, and to try one of their ice cream sandwiches!

excerpts: I got the cookies and cream cookies and the oreo cream ice cream (NOT the cookies and cream ice cream) it was described to me as being similiar to the middle of an oreo and was SOOOO GOOD.
The ice cream was super smooth and creamy and the cookies were fresh baked, dense and so yummy.
Cannot say enough about this place, a must go for a sweet treat and try this combo if you love Oreo's/ cookies and cream :)
cookies and cream cookies.author: Sarah A.
cookies and cream cookies.review: OMG- this was AMAZING. I loved my ice cream sandwich, I've been wanting to try this place for awhile and finally got a chance. I got the cookies and cream cookies and the oreo cream ice cream (NOT the cookies and cream ice cream) it was described to me as being similiar to the middle of an oreo and was SOOOO GOOD. The ice cream was super smooth and creamy and the cookies were fresh baked, dense and so yummy. Cannot say enough about this place, a must go for a sweet treat and try this combo if you love Oreo's/ cookies and cream :)

excerpts: I had the ice cream sandwich with oatmeal raisin cookies and ginger ice cream.
It was amazing!
My husband had the funfetti ice cream, and approved of it (it really tastes like frosting from childhood birthday cakes)!
oatmeal raisin cookies.author: Catherine J.
oatmeal raisin cookies.review: Yummy flavors and cookies! I had the ice cream sandwich with oatmeal raisin cookies and ginger ice cream. It was amazing! My husband had the funfetti ice cream, and approved of it (it really tastes like frosting from childhood birthday cakes)!

excerpts: I got the coffee caramel crunch ice cream and oatmeal raisin cookies.
The ice cream was definitely better than the cookies.
The cookies are probably made that morning or the night before, they aren't soft and right out of the oven like I'm used to with CREAM.
oatmeal raisin cookies.author: Joycelyn L.
oatmeal raisin cookies.review: Came here for dessert and ended up getting a ice cream sandwich.  I got the coffee caramel crunch ice cream and oatmeal raisin cookies.  The ice cream was definitely better than the cookies.  The cookies are probably made that morning or the night before, they aren't soft and right out of the oven like I'm used to with CREAM.  Good thing about this place is they give you the ice cream sandwich in a cup that way if it breaks while you're eating it you can still scoop it up with a spoon.

excerpts: Hubby had snickerdoodles with choc mint ice cream.
So for $10 we had a great honemade dessert very nicely done.
Wish I took a pucture
but it was too good
it went fast !
snickerdoodles.author: Kristin K.
snickerdoodles.review: OMG. I love peanut butter and chocolate so I had the peanutbutter with chocolate chunks cookie ice cream sandwich with chocolate peanutbutter ice cream   $5.00. Hubby had snickerdoodles with choc mint ice cream. So for $10 we had a great honemade dessert very nicely done. Wish I took a pucture but it was too good it went fast !

excerpts: We also got to try one of their freshly baked snickerdoodles, which was perfectly soft on the inside with just a little crisp on the exterior.
A perfect accompaniment to any ice cream experience!
Don't miss this little place on Chestnut if you're looking for innovative flavors that are old school in creaminess and richness.
snickerdoodles.author: Stacey O.
snickerdoodles.review: I've sampled my fair share of ice cream throughout the years, but the flavors I tried at Over the Moon might be the best I've ever had. Cinnamon smores was amazing- like a churro and a smores cookie combined to make the most heavenly flavor that was both sweet and spicy from the cinnamon. I also had Oreo cookie, not to be confused with cookies n cream, which is ice cream made with the cookie part of the Oreo & swirled with the white creamy oreo frosting. The only thing I dislike about Oreos is the texture of the cookie and this completely solved my problem- plus it gave me a straight shot of the amazing Oreo frosting I love so much. My boyfriend had caramel cookie dough which he claims is his new favorite ice cream flavor. We also got to try one of their freshly baked snickerdoodles, which was perfectly soft on the inside with just a little crisp on the exterior. A perfect accompaniment to any ice cream experience! Don't miss this little place on Chestnut if you're looking for innovative flavors that are old school in creaminess and richness.

excerpts: Cookies and cream and Snickerdoodles.
The guy gave me the ones straight from the oven instead of the ones in the jar.
They were very moist (
plus!)
and they weren't grainy or flaky or super hard like other cookies.
5$ for everything!!
Very cheap, quality taste and texture.
Definitely worth it.
snickerdoodles.author: Yvonne N.
snickerdoodles.review: I was just killing time alone the blocks and everyone was out eating ice cream and I started craving. I saw a sign "cookies and ice cream" and decided to try it out because why not? I had this place bookmarked but had no idea until I came inside. It's a pretty small, cute place. Sitting by the window and way in the back. The ice cream flavors didn't  stand out to me much except for the Whiskey Praline. I gave it a try and sure enough, I got it (in a small). And I immediately gobbled that down. Right before dinner. The ice cream is not frozen like most, but on the creamy, soft side. I also got 2 cookies for $2 total! Cookies and cream and Snickerdoodles. The guy gave me the ones straight from the oven instead of the ones in the jar. They were very moist (plus!) and they weren't grainy or flaky or super hard like other cookies. 5$ for everything!! Very cheap, quality taste and texture. Definitely worth it.
